title: MC Pro Quick Take | Britannia Industries: Muted show in a challenging operating environment
description: Normal monsoon and better execution in non-core brands will aid growth recovery.

title: Carlyle Group sells stake in Yes Bank, Goldman Sachs buys stake
description: Goldman Sachs (Singapore) PTE- ODI bought 36.92 crore shares, a 1.23 percent stake in Yes Bank at Rs 24.26.

title: Sharp movements in Vix ahead of elections: Here's expert interpretation
description: When VIX is high, volatility is extremely high and quite often one observes prices crashing ferociously, says derivatives expert Rahul Ghose, CEO of Hedged.in

title: Gainers and Losers: 10 stocks that moved the most on May 3
description: All sectors except Metals and Healthcare ended in the red with Capital Goods, Realty and Telecom falling more than 1 percent.

title: Taking Stock: Nifty below 22,500, Sensex falls 733 pts; realty, banks top drag
description: For the week, BSE Sensex and Nifty50 gave flat returns

title: Live: Nifty takes a sharp u-turn after hitting new high; Coforge, Coal India in focus| Closing Bell
description: Sensex sheds over 700 points to slip below 74,000. Broader markets in red but outperform benchmarks. All sectoral indices in the red led by banks, IT & autos. India VIX jumps 8%; NSE advance-decline ratio at 1:2. Catch Santosh Nair and Nandita Khemka as they discuss stocks on their radar including Coforge and Coal India

title: Neutral Atul; target of Rs 5,670: Motilal Oswal

title: Subscribe Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd; Cholamandalam Securities
description: Cholamandalam Securities, has come out with its report on Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd. The research firm has recommended to “ Subscribe ” the ipo in its research report as on May 03 2024.

title: Buy Castrol (India); target of Rs 240: Motilal Oswal
description: Motilal Oswal is bullish on Castrol (India) has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 240 in its research report dated May 02, 2024.

title: PFC, REC undervalued even after eye-popping rise over last year, say analysts
description: Analysts believe that despite the stupendous rise , the stocks are relatively undervalued. Besides the improving financial strength of the two power financiers, a steady rise in power demand in the country makes for a strong investment case.

title: Freaky Friday! Sensex, Nifty fall up to 1% as heavyweight stocks crack
description: Analysts attribute this fall to pre-Lok Sabha election outcome jitters, earnings season, and a high level of margin trading

title: Kotak Bank Q4 preview: Loan growth to aid net interest income, lower margins may hit profit
description: Kotak Mahindra Bank's NII is expected to increase by 10 percent YoY to Rs 6,690 in Q4FY24, while profit may slip by 6 percent YoY to Rs 3,283 crore
